column3: News;PHNOM PENH (The Cambodia Herald) – Police in Por Senchey district have been searching for four vendors
column5: after a young girl accused of stealing a phone had her head shaved.------The four vendors were not identified
column6: but were three men and one woman
column7: who were questioned over the September 13 incident.------“Four vendors  were called for questioning involving the use of violence and arrest of women who was abducted by the suspects
column8: ” said Por Sen Chey district police chief Yim Saran. The police are waiting to hear  the Phnom Penh Municipal Court Prosecutors’ opinion on he matter before preceding further.------Meanwhile
column9: the suspect woman is being investigated by the police.------On September 13
column10: vendors from Preythea Market arrested a suspected woman who had stolen a mobile phone
column11: retaining the anger and shaving her head to free the bullet and release it.------https://nokorthom.com/2018/09/%E1%9E%85%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%94%E1%9F%8B%E1%9E%85%E1%9F%84%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%80%E1%9F%84%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%9F%E1%9E%80%E1%9F%8B%E1%9E%80%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%94%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%9B-%E1%9E%9F%E1%9E%98%E1%9E%8F%E1%9F%92/
